abstract: Yahoo predicted only modest improvements for this year, suggesting that it would continue to struggle to keep up with Google.
snippet: Yahoo predicted only modest improvements for this year, suggesting that it would continue to struggle to keep up with Google.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo closed the books on a tough year yesterday, reporting that its sales rebounded in the fourth quarter from an especially sluggish third quarter and promising investors that it would soon turn on technology that it hoped would close the widening gap with Google.

headline.main: Profit Down, Outlook Up at Yahoo
headline.print_headline: Profit Off at Yahoo, but Outlook Is Up

abstract: Yahoo closed the books on a tough year Tuesday, reporting that its sales rebounded in the fourth quarter from an especially sluggish third quarter and promising investors that it would soon turn on technology that it hoped would close the widening gap with Google.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo closed the books on a tough year Tuesday, reporting that its sales rebounded in the fourth quarter from an especially sluggish third quarter and promising investors that it would soon turn on technology that it hoped would close the widening gap with Google.

headline.main: Profit Down, Outlook Up at Yahoo
